fr_reason: The first patent (US20230297372A1) improves computational efficiency for a broader range of technology fields involving dimensional arrays of data, while the second patent (US11475102B2) focuses specifically on matrix multiplication operations in deep neural networks.

fr_reason: The first patent reduces carbon dioxide emissions in hydrocarbon cracking systems, while the second patent improves the efficiency of molten carbonate fuel cells.
